articles.description: “Getting back to the pre-Covid standard will take time,” said Carmen Reinhart, the World Bank’s chief economist. “The aftermath of Covid isn’t going to reverse for a lot of countries.''
articles.content: Just as some patients recovering from Covid-19 suffer long-lasting symptoms, its becoming clear that the same will be true for the global economy once this years V-shaped rebound fades.While $26 tril… [+7696 chars]
